00001 
00031 /*
00032   d   [ rho   ]   d   [   rho*u    ]\n
00033   --  [ rho*u ] + --  [rho*u*u + p ] = 0\n
00034   dt  [   e   ]   dx  [ (e+p)*u    ]\n
00035 
00036   Equation of state:
00037            p         1
00038     e = -------  +   - rho * u^2
00039         gamma-1      2
00040 
00041 */
00042 
00043 #include <basic.h>
00044 #include <math.h>
00045 #include <matops.h>

00081 #define _Euler1DGetFlowVar_(u,rho,v,e,P,p) \
00082   { \
00083     double gamma = p->gamma; \
00084     rho = u[0]; \
00085     v   = u[1] / rho; \
00086     e   = u[2]; \
00087     P   = (e - 0.5*rho*v*v) * (gamma-1.0); \
00088   }
00089 
00094 #define _Euler1DSetFlux_(f,rho,v,e,P) \
00095   { \
00096     f[0] = (rho) * (v); \
00097     f[1] = (rho) * (v) * (v) + (P); \
00098     f[2] = ((e) + (P)) * (v); \
00099   }
00100 
00115 #define _Euler1DSetStiffFlux_(f,rho,v,e,P,gamma) \
00116   { \
00117     double gamma_inv = 1.0 / (gamma); \
00118     f[0] = gamma_inv * (rho)*(v); \
00119     f[1] = gamma_inv * (rho)*(v)*(v) + (P); \
00120     f[2] = ((e)+(P)) * (v) - 0.5*gamma_inv*((gamma)-1)*(rho)*(v)*(v)*(v); \
00121   }
00122 
00134 #define _Euler1DSetLinearizedStiffFlux_(f,u,J) \
00135   { \
00136     _MatVecMultiply_((J),(u),(f),(_MODEL_NVARS_)); \
00137   }
00138 
00149 #define _Euler1DSetStiffJac_(J,rho,v,e,P,gamma) \
00150   { \
00151     double gm1 = (gamma)-1; \
00152     double inv_gm = 1.0/(gamma); \
00153     double gm1_inv_gm = gm1 * inv_gm; \
00154     J[0] = 0.5*gm1_inv_gm*(rho)*(v)*(v)*(v)/(P) - (v); \
00155     J[1] = 1.0 - gm1_inv_gm*(rho)*(v)*(v)/(P); \
00156     J[2] = gm1_inv_gm*(rho)*(v)/(P); \
00157     J[3] = 0.5*gm1_inv_gm*(rho)*(v)*(v)*(v)*(v)/(P) + 0.5*((gamma)-5.0)*(v)*(v); \
00158     J[4] = (3.0-(gamma))*(v) - gm1_inv_gm*(rho)*(v)*(v)*(v)/(P); \
00159     J[5] = gm1_inv_gm*(rho)*(v)*(v)/(P) + gm1; \
00160     J[6] = 0.25*gm1_inv_gm*(rho)*(v)*(v)*(v)*(v)*(v)/(P) - (gamma)*(v)*(e)/(rho) + 0.5*(2.0*(gamma)-3.0)*(v)*(v)*(v); \
00161     J[7] = (gamma)*(e)/(rho) - 1.5*gm1*(v)*(v) - 0.5*gm1_inv_gm*(rho)*(v)*(v)*(v)*(v)/(P); \
00162     J[8] = 0.5*gm1_inv_gm*(rho)*(v)*(v)*(v)/(P) + (gamma)*(v); \
00163   }
00164 
00169 #define _Euler1DRoeAverage_(uavg,uL,uR,p) \
00170   { \
00171     double rho ,v ,e ,P ,H ,csq; \
00172     double rhoL,vL,eL,PL,HL,cLsq; \
00173     double rhoR,vR,eR,PR,HR,cRsq; \
00174     double gamma = p->gamma; \
00175     rhoL = uL[0]; \
00176     vL   = uL[1] / rhoL; \
00177     eL   = uL[2]; \
00178     PL   = (eL - 0.5*rhoL*vL*vL) * (gamma-1.0); \
00179     cLsq = gamma * PL/rhoL; \
00180     HL = 0.5*vL*vL + cLsq / (gamma-1.0); \
00181     rhoR = uR[0]; \
00182     vR   = uR[1] / rhoR; \
00183     eR   = uR[2]; \
00184     PR   = (eR - 0.5*rhoR*vR*vR) * (gamma-1.0); \
00185     cRsq = gamma * PR/rhoR; \
00186     HR = 0.5*vR*vR + cRsq / (gamma-1.0); \
00187     double tL = sqrt(rhoL); \
00188     double tR = sqrt(rhoR); \
00189     rho = tL * tR; \
00190     v   = (tL*vL + tR*vR) / (tL + tR); \
00191     H   = (tL*HL + tR*HR) / (tL + tR); \
00192     csq = (gamma-1.0) * (H-0.5*v*v); \
00193     P   = csq * rho / gamma; \
00194     e   = P/(gamma-1.0) + 0.5*rho*v*v; \
00195     \
00196     uavg[0] = rho; \
00197     uavg[1] = rho*v; \
00198     uavg[2] = e; \
00199   }
00200 
00207 #define _Euler1DEigenvalues_(u,D,p,dir) \
00208   { \
00209     double gamma   = p->gamma; \
00210     double rho,v,e,P,c; \
00211     rho = u[0]; \
00212     v   = u[1] / rho; \
00213     e   = u[2]; \
00214     P   = (e - 0.5*rho*v*v) * (gamma-1.0); \
00215     c = sqrt(gamma*P/rho); \
00216     D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = v;      D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;      D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0; \
00217     D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = (v-c);  D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0; \
00218     D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;      D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = (v+c); \
00219   }
00220 
00225 #define _Euler1DLeftEigenvectors_(u,L,p,dir) \
00226   { \
00227     double gamma = p->gamma; \
00228     double rho,v,e,P,c; \
00229     rho = u[0]; \
00230     v   = u[1] / rho; \
00231     e   = u[2]; \
00232     P   = (e - 0.5*rho*v*v) * (gamma-1.0); \
00233     c    = sqrt(gamma*P/rho); \
00234     L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = ((gamma - 1)/(rho*c)) * (-(v*v)/2 - c*v/(gamma-1)); \
00235     L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ((gamma - 1)/(rho*c)) * (v + c/(gamma-1)); \
00236     L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ((gamma - 1)/(rho*c)) * (-1); \
00237     L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = ((gamma - 1)/(rho*c)) * (rho*(-(v*v)/2+c*c/(gamma-1))/c); \
00238     L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ((gamma - 1)/(rho*c)) * (rho*v/c); \
00239     L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ((gamma - 1)/(rho*c)) * (-rho/c); \
00240     L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = ((gamma - 1)/(rho*c)) * ((v*v)/2 - c*v/(gamma-1)); \
00241     L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ((gamma - 1)/(rho*c)) * (-v + c/(gamma-1)); \
00242     L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ((gamma - 1)/(rho*c)) * (1); \
00243   }
00244 
00249 #define _Euler1DRightEigenvectors_(u,R,p,dir) \
00250   { \
00251     double gamma   = p->gamma; \
00252     double rho,v,e,P,c; \
00253     rho = u[0]; \
00254     v   = u[1] / rho; \
00255     e   = u[2]; \
00256     P   = (e - 0.5*rho*v*v) * (gamma-1.0); \
00257     c    = sqrt(gamma*P/rho); \
00258     R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = - rho/(2*c);  R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = -rho*(v-c)/(2*c); R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = -rho*((v*v)/2+(c*c)/(gamma-1)-c*v)/(2*c);  \
00259     R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 1;            R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = v;                R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = v*v / 2;                                   \
00260     R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = rho/(2*c);    R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = rho*(v+c)/(2*c);  R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = rho*((v*v)/2+(c*c)/(gamma-1)+c*v)/(2*c);   \
00261   }
